src/lib/Builder.js
Builder
description:
The builder runs the tasks.
TODO: Find a better solution then format juggling for async.auto.

name: _getTaskOptions
description: Gets the options belonging to the task of `name`.

name: _ensureTaskInstances
description: Instantiates all the tasks.

name: _ensureAsyncTasks
description: Converts Task to async.auto format until I find a better solution.

name: _runTasks
description: Runs all tasks asynchronously and in parallel with dependencies first.

name: _createTaskCallback
description:
Creates a callback for a task to be ran.
TODO: Better describe what this does.

name: addTask
description: Adds a Task.

name: addTasks
description: Adds an Array of Task's.

name: addCompiler
description: Adds a compiler.

name: removeCompiler
description: Removes a compiler.

name: start
description: Starts the builder.

name: src/lib/CompileTask.js
CompileTask
description:
Compiles code from one language to another using a Compiler. May compile in
three ways:
 - Compiling a chunk (string) to another chunk.
 - Compiling a file from a source path to a target path.
 - Compiling a directory of files recursively from a source path to a target
   path, compiling all files that match.

name: sourceFilePathMatchExpression
description: Returns the expression used by the `sourceFilePathMatches` method.

name: sourceFilePathMatches
description: Returns `true` when a file path matches.

name: targetPathReplaceExpression
description: Returns the expression used by the `getTargetPath` method.

name: getTargetPath
description:
Gets the target file path for a source file path.
TODO: Rename to getTargetFilePath, because it is the path of a file.

name: setCompiler
description:
Sets the compiler used to compile chunks. Also adds the Compiler to the
Builder but ensures only one Compiler per instance is active in the
Builder.
TODO: Explain why it's a good thing to only have one compiler in the
      builder per compile task.
TODO: Refactor: Move this to the Builder class.

params.name: CompilerClass
params.description: The compiler class used to compile chunks.

name: ensureFileDirectory
description:
Ensures that a directory is available to write a file to. Creates all
parent directories of the file path.

name: compileFile
description:
Reads a file from the `sourceFilePath`, compiles it using the set compiler
and writes it to the `targetFilePath`.

name: compileAllFiles
description:
Compiles a directory of files recursively from a source path to a target
path, compiling all files that match.

name: src/lib/Compiler.js
src/lib/Options.js
Options
description: Contains all the options. Emits events when changes occur.

name: _emitChange
description: Emits that a change has happened.

name: get
description: Gets the (nested) key from the object.

name: set
description: Sets the value of the (nested) key to `value`.

name: del
description: Sets the value of the (nested) key to `undefined`. Does not delete the key.

name: merge
description:
Merges `object` into the current options, overriding values.
TODO: use _.defaultsDeep

name: removeDependency

name: addDependencies

name: start
description: Starts the task.

src/tasks/_PlantUMLCompile.js
PlantUMLCompile
description:
Constructs a PlantUML version of all classes fed to the compiler and puts
them into one diagram. Only supports a very specific subset of ES6
functionality;
 - Every module included in the graph contains one class.
 - Class names are unique (for now).

name: addClass
description: Adds a class to the classes.

name: removeClass
description: Removes a class from the classes.

name: hasClass
description: Returns true if the AST contains a class token, otherwise it returns false.

name: doesClassExtend
description: Returns true if the class extends another, otherwise it returns false.

name: getClassParent
description: Returns the name of the parent class.

name: addClassParent
description: Adds the parent class as parent to this one.

name: setClassParent
description: Sets the parent of the class, if any.

name: setClassMethods
description: Sets the methods of the class, if any.

name: getClassName
description: Returns the name of the class in the AST of a module.

name: convert
description:
Converts a chunk of ES6 code - containing a complete module - to a class.
in-memory model inside the instance.
